[Groovy] Class SampleInfo

java.lang.Object
  SampleInfo

class SampleInfo

Meta data about a sample.

Designed to be compatible with the MGHA sample information format.

Property Summary
static List MG_COLUMNS

MGHA redefined column order and contents to have a lot of things not of interest to others, so have a separate mapping for them.
static List SIMPLE_COLUMNS

String analysisContact

String batch

Id of batch in which the sample was sequenced
List captureDates

Consanguinity consanguinity

Whether the sample is consanguinous
float dnaConcentrationNg

DNA quality in nanograms
List dnaDates

float dnaQuality

float dnaQuantity

Ethnicity ethnicity

Map fileMappings

Map files

List of files containing data specific to this sample, indexed by file types: - fastq - coverage (output from coverageBed) - vcf - bam
Map geneCategories

List of genes prioritised for the sample
String institution

Hospital or organization responsible for the patient from which the sample originated
String library

The library
List machineIds

float meanCoverage

Mean coverage as reported by sequencing provider
String pedigree

The pedigree of the family
String sample

Sample name
SampleType sampleType

Whether the sample type is normal or tumor
String sequencingContact

List sequencingDates

Sex sex

The sex of the sample
String target

Target (flagship) name
String variantsFile

parse_sample_info

static java.lang.Object parse_sample_info(java.lang.Object fileName, java.lang.Object columns = SIMPLE_COLUMNS)
Parse the given file to extract sample information
Returns:
List of (Map) objects defining properties of each sample:
  • sample name (sample),
  • FastQ files (files),
  • Name of flagship (target)
  • Genes to be classed as high priority (genes)

    • toString

    java.lang.String toString()

    toTsv

    java.lang.String toTsv()

    validate

    void validate()
    Validates that text fields are in the correct format.

    This format validation is specific to melbourne genomics.
